thread.title: Suriya denies being part of Bahubali 2
thread.title_full: Suriya denies being part of Bahubali 2 - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Suriya denies being part of Bahubali 2
text: Ever since Suriya launched the trailer of Bahubali in Chennai, there have been rumours that the actor will be part of Bahubali 2. Then came reports of how, at an event not so long ago, Suriya expressed his interest in teaming up with director SS Rajamouli. This added to the speculations that Suriya is part of Bahubali 2, especially as the actor himself neither denied, nor confirmed the veracity of the rumours. So when we contacted Suriya himself and figure out what is the actual development on the connection between him and Bahubali 2, the actor said, "To my knowledge, no, we didn't have any such discussions of my being in this film."
